title: Amid Inflation, Retailers Brace for Strapped Holiday Shoppers
description: Retailers have navigated pandemic closures and supply chain snarls in recent years. But dealing with the fallout from inflation could be an even tougher test.
dc:creator: Jordyn Holman
media:credit: John Taggart for The New York Times
media:description: November and December can account for up to a quarter of the annual sales of department stores and specialty retailers.
